com.phunware.core
Class CoreModule

java.lang.Object
  com.phunware.core.CoreModule

public class CoreModule
extends java.lang.Object

Intended to be extended by any main class of a module. Any class extending this should have a default constructor and call the super constructor to properly initialize the module.

onServiceAction

public void onServiceAction(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String actionId)
Called by CoreModuleManager.onServiceAction from CoreService. Each module can use this callback to handle a service action (meaning start a service queue and specify an action, service handler will use this callback to trigger the action.).

actionId - - id use call a particular class method. (i.e. id is "com.phunware.core.PwLog.setShowLog))
